definition: a shot in billiards in which the cue ball contacts one object ball and then the other, to make a carom
details:
noun
- a shot in billiards in which the cue ball contacts one object ball and then the other
= synonyms: cannon
- a glancing rebound
= synonyms: ricochet
verb
- to make a carom
- to rebound after hitting
= example: to rebound after hitting
